page.title: 04Religion
page.content: The Church of England is the most prominent{religion}in this area closely followed by Catholicism.There are also a large number of Chapel worshippers and some Jehovah Witnessess.A large number of people do not belong to any recognised religious sect. The Quidenham{parish church}in the East of the block serves ascattered population,and contains a Stained glass window to commemorate Bomber crews stationed in the area during the 1939-1945 war. There is a{Carmelite Monastry}in Quidenham which houses an enclosed order of nuns. There is a{Pagan}burial mound reputedly of Queen Boudica in Quidenham (027878).
